verses.2: “Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin, Topa adingin a mahmah a kituam koih nadingin Nazir kiciamna ahi, a tuam mahmah kiciamna a bawl ciangin,
verses.3: leenggahzu le khamtheih zu ne lo ding hi. Leenggahzu le khamtheih zu pan a kibawl tui thuk dawn lo dinga, leenggahtui khat peuhpeuh dawn loin, leenggah a hing hitaleh a keu hitaleh ne lo ding hi.
verses.4: Amah a kituam koih hun sungteng leenggui panin a piang bangmah ne lo dinga, a tang ahi a, a hawng nangawn ahi zongin ne lo ding hi.
verses.5: “Tuam om dingin a kiciam hun sungteng ama lu tungah mulkiatna kitah lo ding hi. Topa adingin a tuam om hun a cin mateng amah a siangtho hi dinga, a sam a sau-in hawi ding hi.
verses.6: Topa adingin a tuam om hun sungteng misi luang kiangah pai lo ding hi.
verses.7: A nu, a pa, a sanggamnu, a sanggampa ahi zongin a sih leh tuate khat peuhpeuh hangin amah kininsak lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian adingin a tuam omna ama lu tungah om hi.
verses.8: A tuam om hun sungteng Topa adingin a siangtho ahi hi.
verses.9: “Mi khatpeuh ama gei ah thakhatin si-in, amah in a ki-ap ama sam a nitsak leh, ni sagih sung ngakin tua ciangin kisiansuahin a sam met ding hi.
verses.10: A ni giat ni-in amah in siampipa kiang kikhopna buk kongah vakhu nih ahih kei leh kawl vakhu no nih paipih dinga,
verses.11: siampipa in khialhna hanga biak nadingin khat pia-in, meihal biak nadingin a khat pia dinga, ama adingin kilemna bawlsak ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh misi luang hangin amah khial hi. Amah in tua ni mahin a lutang ap phakik dinga,
verses.12: a tuam om ding hun sungteng Topa adingin amah tuam omin, mawhna hanga biak nadingin kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat paipih ding hi. Ahih hangin ama tuam omna kininsak khin ahih manin a masa hun pen a mawkna hi ding hi.
verses.13: “A tuam om hun a cin ciangin zuih ding Nazir ngeinate: Kikhopna buk kongah amah kipaipih dinga,
verses.14: amah in Topaʼ tungah letsong ahi meihal biak nadingin kum khat a pha a sitbaang lo tuuno a pa khat, khialhna hanga biak nadingin kum khat a pha a sitbaang lo tuuno a nu khat le thunuam a biak nadingin a sitbaang lo tuutal khat,
verses.15: le silngo sawh loh anlum lawh khat, sathau tawh a kibawl annel mohte le silngo sawh loh, sathau tawh a kizut mohphengte le an tawh biaknate le leenggahzu tawh biaknate paipih ding hi.
verses.16: “Siampipa in Topaʼ mai ah tuate paipihin a khialhna hanga biakna le a meihal biakna pia dinga,
verses.17: a tuutal pen Topaʼ tungah thunuam a biakna-in silngo sawh loh anlum lawh tawh pia khawm dinga, an tawh a biakna le leenggahzu tawh biakna zong siampipa in pia ding hi.
verses.18: Tua Nazir mipa in a ki-ap a sam, kikhopna buk kongah met dinga, a ki-ap ama lutang panin a samte la-in thunuam a biakpiakna nuai ah a om mei sungah hal ding hi.
verses.19: “Siampipa in a kihuan sa tuutal liang le lawh sung panin silngo sawh loh moh khat le silngo sawh loh mohpheng khat la-in, a ki-ap hun sunga a sam a met khit ciangin tua Nazir mipaʼ khut ah tuate koih dinga,
verses.20: Topaʼ mai ah vei-a biak nadingin siampipa in tuate vei ding hi. Tuate pen a kivei a sa-iik le a kipia a phei tawh siampipa adingin a siangtho ama tanh ahi hi. Tua khit ciangin Nazir mipa in leenggahzu ne thei ding hi.
verses.21: “Hih pen kiciamna a la Nazir mipa adingin ngeina ahi hi. Ama piak zawh zahzah a piak banah, Topaʼ tungah ama piakna pen Nazir hihna tawh a kiciamna bang hi dinga, ama kiciamna mah bangin amah in Nazir hihna tawh tuam om nading ngeina zui-in a gamta ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.23: “Aaron le a tapate tungah hih bangin gen in: Note in hih bangin Israel mite thupha na pia ding uh hi. Amaute tungah hih bangin na ci ding uh hi:
verses.24: Topa in note thupha hong pia-in hong kem tahen.
verses.25: Topa in note tungah a maitang hong taangsakin note hong ompih tahen.
verses.26: Topa in note tungah a maipha hong pia henla, note tungah nopsakna hong pia tahen,’ ci-in thupha pia uh hen.
verses.27: “Amaute in tua bangin Israel mite tungah keima min lo ding uh a, keimah in amaute thupha ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
